subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: In the women’s 400 meters, Dee Dee Trotter’s earned her a second trip to the Olympics Thursday night while Jeremy Wariner lost the hold he has had on the men’s race for the past six years.
snippet: In the women’s 400 meters, Dee Dee Trotter’s earned her a second trip to the Olympics Thursday night while Jeremy Wariner lost the hold he has had on the men’s race for the past six years.
